title: Vehicular Satellite Communication On-the-move Station
explain: The vehicular satellite communication on-the-move station is a mobile satellite communication system, which is used for emergency command and communication support.
features:
Features

  • remote communication can be established by satellite, services including voice, data, and image;
  • Large capacity and high quality services transmission can be realized during travelling.
form:
Specifications
Maximum vehicle speed100km/h（expressway）40km/h（third-level road）
Initial capturing satellite≤3 minutes
Sheltering recapturing≤3s
Operation bandKu
Antenna aperture0.6m、0.9m、1.2m
PA power4W-100W, optional
Data rate64kbps~2Mbps
